verbs.description: isis [V: hate] [ARG0: preacher] anjem choudary must take uk anti - extremism course after prison release report says notorious islamist preacher anjem choudary must complete what is being described as britain first compulsory deradicalization program as part of his probation following his early release from prison the times of london reported late sunday u s embassy u k prison the times united nations band islamic caliphate state britain london uk syria anjem choudary islamic state us embassy lee rigby united nations
